game.name: Mainframe Men
game.shortDescription: Learn about the ancestors of the very computer that you're looking at this now with in this interactive visual novel. ENIAC, UNIVAC... Wait, are these machines talking to you?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Learn about the ancestors of the very computer that you're looking at this now with in this interactive visual novel. ENIAC, UNIVAC... Wait, are these machines talking to you?
